Episodes.Title: The Magic Hour
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Earl discovers that a dying kid whose wish he ruined years earlier is still alive, he promises to help him make a movie.

Episodes.Title: Monkeys Take a Bath
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: While working on the list, Earl uncovers a one-night stand from 1985 between his mom and their old neighbor. When Earl's dad finds out, he moves in with Earl and vows to get revenge.

Episodes.Title: Joy in a Bubble
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Jessica Goldstein, Chrissy Pietrosh
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl gives Joy a hot tub he found on the side of the road to cross an item off his list. However, Joy suffers an infection, and Crabman quarantines her in the trailer. As a result, Earl must perform Joy's daily chores.

Episodes.Title: Stole an RV
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy make amends for a depressed elderly man whose RV they stole years earlier. Their efforts fire him up enough that the man now wants to take revenge on another man who left him on the front line during the Korean War.

Episodes.Title: Sweet Johnny
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl needs to make up for sleeping with local stuntman's girlfriend. Joy gets carjacked and feels the need to buy a gun.

Episodes.Title: We've Got Spirit
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl makes some great personal sacrifices to help Randy realize his dream of going to cheerleading camp, and Joy is upset because her son finds Catalina sexier than her.

Episodes.Title: Quit Your Snitchin'
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: It's Randy's birthday in 2 days and Earl buys him a nice car. It gets stolen and Earl buys it back. When stolen again, he considers snitching.

Episodes.Title: Little Bad Voodoo Brother
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl has a chance to cross two items off his list by throwing Joy's boys a Halloween party, and getting Randy a "little brother"--Catalina's nephew. But both could fail because everyone thinks Catalina's nephew is possessed.

Episodes.Title: Sold a Guy a Lemon Car
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl discovers that the apparent psychopath who has moved in next door to him and Randy at the hotel is actually a guy from his past who is on the list.

Episodes.Title: Earl and Joy's Anniversary
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl reminisces about his and Joy's near-disastrous first wedding anniversary party, in which Earl finds out that Joy slept with Earl's cousin who is better than him at everything.

Episodes.Title: Nature's Game Show
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: During a series of tornadoes in Camden County, Earl loses his list, Randy believes that he has super powers, Catalina finds religion, and Joy and Darnell argue over Joy's intelligence.

Episodes.Title: Reading Is a Funda Mental Case
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy discover that an old friend is living in the woods in a Bookmobile they stole years earlier, and that he has gone completely crazy.

Episodes.Title: Orphan Earl
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Earl tries to make amends to a man that he conned out of $100, he discovers that Joy and her friends are still conning him.

Episodes.Title: Got the Babysitter Pregnant
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Vali Chandrasekaran, Patrick McCarthy
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to help his old babysitter, whom he got pregnant by poking holes in her condom, by whipping her deadbeat son into shape. However, Randy gets mad at Earl when he recognizes the similarities between the man and himself.

Episodes.Title: Darnell Outed: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to get Joy a spot on a reality show starring Erik Estrada. However, he only causes great embarrassment, and accidentally gets Darnell's Witness Protection location revealed.

Episodes.Title: Darnell Outed: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Hunter Covington, Matt Ward
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: With Darnell's identity compromised, the Turners receive a new Witness Protection identity as a Jewish family. But what will they do with Joy gets a second chance to appear on "Estrada or Nada?"

Episodes.Title: Randy's List Item
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Randy wins the lottery, he decides to create a list item for himself. Meanwhile, Joy is dissatisfied with her family's Witness Protection identities and locations.

Episodes.Title: Friends with Benefits
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Jessica Goldstein, Chrissy Pietrosh
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl visits Joy at her new Witness Protection location to return Mr. Turtle to Darnell, and stays to help her make new friends. Meanwhile, Randy makes a new "friend" while Earl is gone.

Episodes.Title: My Name Is Alias
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Darnell's father uses Earl and Randy to track Darnell down and tell him that he can get his old identity back if he agrees to do one more top secret job for The Agency.

Episodes.Title: Chaz Dalton's Space Academy
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl makes amends to an astronaut on his list who runs a space academy, but in the process discovers that he's a fraud. However, the man he's posing turns out to be no better than the impostor.

Episodes.Title: Witch Lady
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Michael Shipley, Matt Ward
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to make amends to Camden's "Witch Lady," which only sparks her anger and causes her to hold everyone who's wronged her in the past hostage in her basement.

Episodes.Title: Pinky
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Randy finds out that Pinky, his first childhood crush, was actually Joy and that Earl went behind his back for selfish reasons to break them up.

Episodes.Title: Bullies
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Vali Chandrasekaran, Hunter Covington
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to help a man he bullied in grade school, but hides his true identity because the man has become a scary bodybuilder. Meanwhile, Randy begins taking shark adrenaline so that he can finally stand up to Joy.

Episodes.Title: Gospel
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Mike Mariano, Deweyne LaMar Lee
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl's efforts to help a reverend who is on his list multiple times drive the reverend back to his old life of crime, while Joy risks getting her third strike when she hits Catalina with a riding lawn mower.

Episodes.Title: Inside Probe: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The investigative television show "Inside Probe" looks into the disappearance of the owner of the Crab Shack.

Episodes.Title: Inside Probe: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Michael Pennie, Timothy Stack
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Part 2 of the "Inside Probe" investigation of the owner of the Crab Shack's disappearance uncovers surprising new revelations.

Episodes.Title: Dodge's Dad
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Alan Kirschenbaum, Danielle Sanchez-Witzel
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Joy tells Earl that Little Chubby is Dodge's father, and Little Chubby makes Earl's life Hell after he tells him the news.
